name: Trem
details:
OMICRON SERIES ANALOG TREMOLO PEDAL“TREM” is a tiny little machine that packs a volumetric ton of oomph. With only two knobs, the user is able to manipulate a signal’s volume within a vast spectrum of possibility: from a slow and shallow push/pull, all the way through to a quick and choppy pulse.
https://malekkoheavyindustry.com/product/trem/
